name: Burning Out!
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 97: Simulation where the limitation was "Movement is Lethal".

OVERVIEW:

Guide a sentient pack of dynamite to the goal! Make sure you don't blow its fuse when you go fast! Go for a record time!

CONTROLS:

- Arrow Keys: Move

- Z: Jump

- X + Hold Arrow Key(s): Blast Jump

- Hold Z while holding a direction against a wall: Wall Slide

- R: Reset

- Hold C: Reset high score

- Esc: Quit the game

CREDITS:

- Sprites made by me

- Sounds generated by jsfxr: https://sfxr.me/

- Song is "Extreme Action" from Bensound (Royalty-Free): https://www.bensound.com/
